mainText:
Steve Jobs changed my life. There is rarely a moment in the day when I 
am more than a few minutes away from a product that he was responsible 
for conceiving, innovating or introducing from my Mac to my iPhone to my 
iPad to my Apple TV and to the software that runs all of them. He has 
improved the way I do my job, communicate with my friends and family, 
produce my podcast, share my photos, listen to music and watch TV. I 
will miss Steve Jobs greatly.
author: John
